body_html: Indeed, pip3 install --upgrade tensorflow-gpu seems to be causing the issue (tested on Win 10), despite installing the Visual C++ Redistributable. Installing via the following command solves the problem: pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/windows/cpu/tensorflow-1.0.0-cp35-cp35m-win_amd64.whl

Installing via the following command solves the problem: pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/windows/cpu/tensorflow-1.0.0-cp35-cp35m-win_amd64.whl
body: Indeed, `pip3 install --upgrade tensorflow-gpu` seems to be causing the issue (tested on Win 10), despite installing the Visual C++ Redistributable. Installing via the following command solves the problem: pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/windows/cpu/tensorflow-1.0.0-cp35-cp35m-win_amd64.whl
